meanings.definition: A set of rules or guidelines for communication or interaction.
meanings.sent1: Following the protocols ensures smooth communication between team members.
meanings.sent2: It is important to adhere to the protocols when sharing sensitive information.
meanings.sent3: The office party had a fun twist where everyone had to communicate using only the protocols.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the protocols act as the traffic lights guiding interactions.
meanings.sent5: Learning the protocols is like learning the secret language of effective communication.

meanings.definition: A formal agreement or treaty between countries.
meanings.sent1: The two nations signed the protocols to establish peaceful relations.
meanings.sent2: The protocols between the neighboring countries helped prevent conflicts.
meanings.sent3: During the summit, the leaders joked about the protocols being written in invisible ink.
meanings.sent4: The protocols serve as the foundation for diplomatic relationships between nations.
meanings.sent5: The signing of the protocols marked a new era of cooperation between the countries.

meanings.definition: The original draft or record of a document or transaction.
meanings.sent1: The protocols of the meeting were carefully documented for future reference.
meanings.sent2: The legal team reviewed the protocols to ensure accuracy in the records.
meanings.sent3: The old protocols of the contract were found hidden in a dusty drawer.
meanings.sent4: The protocols of the agreement were like a time capsule preserving the details.
meanings.sent5: Examining the protocols revealed the initial stages of the project planning.
